Title: Sign Up with valid username & password
Precondition: User is on Sign Up page
Steps:
1. Go to Sign Up page
2. Enter valid username & password
3. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: Account created successfully and alert appears

Title: Sign Up with empty username
Steps:
1. Go to Sign Up page
2. Leave username empty, enter valid password
3. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: Error message: "Please fill out Username and Password"
Actual Result: Alert: "Please fill out Username and Password"

Title: Sign Up with empty password
Steps:
1. Go to Sign Up page
2. Enter valid username, leave password empty
3. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: Error message: "Please fill out Username and Password"
Actual Result: Alert: "Please fill out Username and Password"

Title: Sign Up with existing username
Steps:
1. Go to Sign Up page
2. Enter an already registered username and password
3. Click Sign Up

Title: Sign Up with weak/short password
Steps:
1. Go to Sign Up page
2. Enter valid username and weak password
3. Click Sign Up
Actual Result: DemoBlaze does not validate password length → User created anyway

Title: username with Arabic characters
Steps:
1. Enter Arabic username
2. Enter valid password
3. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: System should accept both English and Arabic usernames

Title: username with extra long input
Steps:
1. Enter long username (50+ chars)
2. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: System should show alert “Username too long”

Title: Verify password requires at least one uppercase letter
Steps:
1. Enter password without uppercase
2. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: System should show alert “Password must include at least one uppercase letter”

Title: Verify password requires at least one number
Steps:
1. Enter password without numbers
2. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: System should show alert “Password must include at least one number”

Title: Verify password requires at least one special character
Steps:
1. Enter password without special character
2. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: System should show alert “Password must include at least one special character”
